newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico to slap tariff on Taiwanese ball bearings.
newsitem.headline: Mexico to slap tariff on Taiwanese ball bearings.

text.p: Mexico's Trade Ministry said Monday an order will be published in the government's Official Gazette on Tuesday slapping a 19.4 percent tariff on ball bearings imported from Taiwan.

Tariffs on imports will be imposed following an investigation into the dumping of the product on the Mexican market at prices below production cost came down in favor of Mexican ball bearing producers, the ministry said.
((--Chris Aspin, Mexico City newsroom +525 7289530)) E-mail at chris.aspin@reuters.com
